name: Starbase Assault
description:
Far from now in a nearby galaxy....

How to Play:

Arrows move, and X shoots!

Shoot down your enemies.  Look for blue power capsules (extra shields) and green power capsules (upgrades your lasers).

Can you take the high score?  Can you defeat the Galactic Tyrant's personal dreadnaught after dispatching his entire fleet and fortified starbases?  Only time will tell...
